example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS دغدغت) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مشاعر) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN اغاني) (UCP-TTL (ADJP (PUNC ") (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC راجعين) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN قوة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السلاح))))

arg.g: songs "returning by the force of arms"
